nml_option.name: config_use_okubo_weiss
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member okubo_weiss is called.

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_compute_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_directory
nml_option.description: subdirectory to write eddy census text files

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_threshold_value
nml_option.description: Threshold below which normalized OW values are counted as eddies, typically -0.2

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_normalization
nml_option.description: Parameter by which the OW values are normalized, typically the standard deviation of OW

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_lambda2_normalization
nml_option.description: Parameter by which the lambda_2 values are normalized, typically the standard deviation of lambda_2

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_use_lat_lon_coords
nml_option.description: If true, latitude/longitude coordinates are output for eddy census. Otherwise x/y/z coordinates are used. Ignored if not on a sphere.

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_compute_eddy_census
nml_option.description: If true, connected components of thresholded OW values are computed, and used to compute an eddy census.

nml_option.name: config_okubo_weiss_eddy_min_cells
nml_option.description: Minimum number of cells that a connected component must contain to be considered an eddy. This needs to be scaled based on expected eddy size given a grid resolution.

package.name: amOkuboWeiss
package.description: This package includes variables required for the amOkuboWeiss analysis member.

var.name: lambda1
var.description: Lambda 1, first eigenvalue of 2d strain rate tensor

var.name: lambda2
var.description: Lambda 2, second eigenvalue of 2d strain rate tensor

var.name: lambda2R3
var.description: Lambda 2, second eigenvalue of full 3d strain rate tensor
